tool_description: Movies and TV shows database - API
name: IMDb
title: IMDb

api_list.name: Get episodes of tv show by imdb_id
api_list.description: Get episodes of a season from the tv show by its imdb_id.

api_list.name: Get cast by imdb_id
api_list.description: Get cast of a movie or tv show by its imdb_id and get response in JSON.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb207.p.rapidapi.com/cast/tt1520211"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb207.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb207.p.rapidapi.com/cast/{imdb_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb207.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get data by imdb_id
api_list.description: Get data of a specific movie or tv show by its imdb_id and get response in JSON.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb207.p.rapidapi.com/id/tt1520211"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb207.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search by Title name
api_list.description: Search any movie or tv show title to get its data as a response in JSON.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb207.p.rapidapi.com/title/the walking dead"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb207.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb207.p.rapidapi.com/title/{titlename}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb207.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
